[i](As an Encounter enters, choose an opponent to protect it while you and other players attack it. When defense counters are removed, create a 0/0 Army token if you don’t control one, then put that many +1/+1 counters on a Army you control.)[/i]
When Crisis in Avaz enters, search your library for a basic land or a Satrapy card, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
